articles.title: Glove maker WRP Asia found 838 Covid-19 cases among 2838 workers - Malaysiakini
articles.description: As of today, its operations have yet to resume, while steps have been taken to quarantine all infected workers.

articles.title: Taiwan says Thailand prioritising AstraZeneca shots for itself - The Star Online
articles.description: Thailand is prioritising for itself AstraZeneca Plc's Covid-19 vaccines produced in the South-East Asian nation because of the severity of the pandemic there, thus delaying deliveries to Taiwan, President Tsai Ing-wen said on Friday.
